name: DogBuster
description:
Demo Alpha build of Dogbuster

You are Jake Barkley, dog accountant. Fight the evil dog mafia with the help of your animal friends!

Gamepad recommended!

-rack up combos to restore health!

-talk to your animal friends!

-play with guns!

-audio for chirps sampled from REAL dog toys!

-experience bugs!

-AND MORE!
